sources.full: The King's Army - Complete Monster Pack

entries: 国王和王后
国王保罗-变形金刚和皇后阿德里亚-杜伦领导着这个王国。虽然保罗是国王，但他实际上并不是皇室成员，多年前与当时的阿德里亚-杜伦公主结婚。自从阿德里亚的父亲去世后，除了他的妻子之外，帕蒂尔国王也继承了王位。
阿德里亚-杜伦女王
皇后是天生的皇室成员，她年轻时大部分时间都过着公主的生活。虽然她擅长皇家公主应有的细微差别和举止，但她渴求冒险。当她遇到冒险家保罗-变形金刚时，她被他的故事和他的冒险天性迷住了。
人民的统治者。
虽然她的丈夫是王国的统治者，但没有阿德里亚女王，王国就不会运行。她小时候的许多课程教会她如何成为一个好的统治者，强硬而又善良。然而，她最大的优势在于她能够用自己的语言和微微的微笑来激励人们。阿德里亚王后天生的领导能力使她能够坐在后台，帮助和指导国王统治她家族王国的人民。

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: 阿德里亚女王在对被害人的救赎上有优势（%0%），而且魔法无法使她入睡。

trait.name: Disarming Smile
entries: 阿德里亚女王精通皇家政治。她在所有的魅力检查和蓄势待发方面都有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 阿德里亚女王用她的长剑 "低语 "进行了两次攻击

action.name: Whisper
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6})毒伤害。

action.name: Inspire! (5/Day}
entries: 女王激励她忠诚的臣民之一，使他们在下一次的攻击卷中获得优势，并获得命中率奖励（（%0%））。
国王和王后
国王保罗-变形金刚和皇后阿德里亚-杜伦领导着这个王国。虽然保罗是国王，但他实际上并不是皇室成员，多年前与当时的阿德里亚-杜伦公主结婚。自从阿德里亚的父亲去世后，除了他的妻子之外，帕蒂尔国王也继承了王位。
王宝强变身
保罗国王落入了皇室。他开始时和许多人一样，是个年轻的冒险家，渴望在这个世界上扬名。在
在一次冒险中，他遇到了阿德里亚-杜伦公主，并立刻坠入爱河。自从成为国王后，他以他希望的公平和公正的方式领导王国。变形人。虽然他的姓氏很奇特，但保罗国王并不是一个变形金刚。他奇怪的名字来自于一个传言，保罗曾经作为一个半兽人呆过。这个故事说，他在一场大战中死去，只是被一个友好的德鲁伊复活为半兽人。他对这个新的身体感到愤怒，于是进行了一次漫长的旅行，以恢复他的自然精灵形态。

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: 保罗王在对被害人的救赎上有优势（%0%），而且魔法无法使他入睡。

trait.name: Royal Immunity
entries: 保罗王对疯狂的法术冠冕有免疫力

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 保罗国王用他的大斧头Songbringer进行了两次攻击

action.name: Songbringer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5})雷霆伤害。

action.name: Call Lightning
entries: 保罗王召唤雷电，攻击30英尺内的一个生物。目标生物必须在{@dc 14}智慧救赎中成功，否则会受到28({@damage 8d6})雷电伤害。拯救成功后，该生物会受到一半的伤害。

monster.name: Paige Truestrike (Commander of King Army)

entries: 国王军队的指挥官们
国王手下的所有部队都向三位指挥官中的一位报告。每位指挥官都是一个令人生畏的
他或她自己的权利的战士，通过伟大的勇敢和智慧的壮举赢得了他或她的部队的尊重。
军队的最大部分向泰冯报告，他是一个可怕的半兽人战士，后来成为战略家。佩奇-特鲁斯特里克（Paige Truestrike），一个虔诚的女人，领导着国王的专业部队，从狼骑兵到米特拉尔卫队。最后一位指挥官是一位名叫尼克斯-里弗松（Nix Riversong）的强大施法者，负责监督国王手下所有的施法者。
佩吉-特鲁斯特里克指挥官
佩奇-特鲁斯特里克（Paige Truestrike）是阿拉瓦伊的虔诚崇拜者，一直不受关注。一个严肃而疏远的女人，佩奇以冷酷的效率管理她手下的人。没有多少人见过她的战斗，但她的刀法是毋庸置疑的。
卑微的开端。
关于佩奇的童年，人们所知不多。然而，她作为一个冒险家慢慢地在整个王国中声名鹊起，做着伟大的任务，寻找着传奇的宝藏。没有人哄她，她就不说自己过去的冒险经历，把那些个人的记忆珍藏起来。
特殊设备。
通过她的冒险，佩奇收集了各种魔法装备。最突出的两件宝物是她的刀，弗罗斯特，和她的动画盾牌。当被问及她是如何得到她的任何魔法物品时，她通常只是笑笑说："这是在不同的时间里与朋友们的一次冒险。"
刀锋的主人。
自从成为指挥官以来，佩奇就没有拿起过她的刀。然而，她经常去练习场，与所有挑战她的人进行比武。她迅速而毫不费力地瓦解了她的所有对手。许多人打赌，赌每个人在面对指挥官时能坚持多久。

trait.name: Animated Shield
entries: 只要低声说一句话，佩奇就能激活她的动画盾牌，盾牌会开始漂浮在她周围。这使她在1分钟内获得盾牌的奖励，同时释放出她的双手。

trait.name: Divine Smite
entries: 佩奇的所有攻击都带有神力。每次攻击都会造成额外的（（%0%））辐射伤害。她可以通过消耗一个法术槽来增加这个伤害。每一级法术槽的伤害增加({@damage 1d8})。

trait.name: Aura of Courage
entries: 在佩奇30英尺范围内的所有盟友对恐惧影响免疫

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 佩奇可以用她的长剑 "冰霜 "进行4次攻击。

action.name: Longsword (Frost)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 1d8 + 8})雷霆伤害，加上4({@damage 1d8})辐射伤害。

action.name: Lay On Hands (5/Day)
entries: 佩奇有一个受祝福的治疗触摸。她可以触摸范围内的一个生物，或以她自己为目标，为他们治疗35点生命值。

action.name: Sprout Wings (1/Day)
entries: 佩奇将她对女神的虔诚传递给她的女神，并从她的背部长出天使的翅膀。翅膀持续1小时，佩奇获得60英尺的飞行速度。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 佩奇是一个施法者。她的法术能力是魅力（法术救赎（%0%），用法术攻击命中率+10）。
佩奇可以使用圣骑士法术列表中的任何法术。她在列出的等级中拥有以下法术槽。

legendaryHeader: The paige truestrike can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The paige truestrike regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Dash
entries: 佩奇在一个特定的方向上移动或飞行她总移动量的一半。这不会激起机会攻击。寻找弱点（2次行动）。佩奇快速检查一个生物，在她对目标生物的下一次攻击卷中获得优势。

legendary.name: Expoint Weakness (3 Actions)
entries: 佩奇在一个生物的盔甲上寻找弱点。她做了一个{@dc 12}感知检查。如果成功，如果她对该目标的下一次攻击命中，将自动达到关键命中。

legendary.name: Find Weakness (2 action)
entries: 佩奇迅速检查一个生物，在她对目标生物的下一次攻击卷中获得优势。

monster.name: Nix Riversong (Commander of King Army)

entries: 国王军队的指挥官们
国王手下的所有部队都向三位指挥官中的一位报告。每位指挥官都是一个令人生畏的
他或她自己的权利的战士，通过伟大的勇敢和智慧的壮举赢得了他或她的部队的尊重。
军队的最大部分向泰冯报告，他是一个可怕的半兽人战士，后来成为战略家。佩奇-特鲁斯特里克（Paige Truestrike），一个虔诚的女人，领导着国王的专业部队，从狼骑兵到米特拉尔卫队。最后一位指挥官是一位名叫尼克斯-里弗松（Nix Riversong）的强大施法者，负责监督国王手下所有的施法者。
指挥官尼克斯-里弗松
尼克斯-里弗松与其他指挥官非常不同。尼克斯是一个苍白的精灵，是一个魔法大师。除了领导国王手下的所有魔法部队外，他还领导魔法学校。
狂野的过去。
尼克斯，和佩奇指挥官一样，曾经是一名冒险家。与他的指挥官同伴不同，他喜欢谈论他的冒险和他所完成的伟大壮举。由于这个原因，他受到新部队的喜爱，他们喜欢听他的宏伟故事。
召唤师。
尼克斯已经开发出他自己的特殊品牌的魔法。从变戏法学校衍生出来的尼克斯设计了法术，将各种各样的生物召唤到这个世界上。他不断地把生物拉到这个世界上，向魔法学校的学生炫耀。

trait.name: Master of ice
entries: 尼克斯是所有冷魔法的大师。尼克斯的所有召唤物在攻击时都会造成额外的（（%0%））寒冷伤害。

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: 尼克斯对被人有优势（%0%），魔法不能让他睡觉。

action.name: Summon minor creature
entries: 尼克斯引导他的魔法来召唤一个生物为他战斗。他可以召唤任何CR7或更低的生物，只要它不是亡灵。该生物持续1分钟或直到其死亡。它将在尼克斯的回合之后直接进行。

action.name: Summon Major Creature (3/Day)
entries: 尼克斯深入研究强大的魔法，召唤出一个更强大的生物。尼克斯可以召唤任何CR15或更低的生物，只要它不是亡灵。该生物将持续10分钟或直到它死亡。它直接在尼克斯的回合之后进行。

action.name: Quarterstaff (One-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d6})重击伤害。

action.name: Quarterstaff (Two-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d8})重击伤害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Nix Riversong 是一个20级的施法者。它的法术能力是智力（法术保存（%0%），用法术攻击+12命中率}。尼克斯-里弗松准备了以下巫师法术。

legendaryHeader: Nix Riversong can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Nix Riversong regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Summon: Move!
entries: 尼克斯指示他的一个召唤物移动到其移动速度。这种移动会引发机会攻击。

legendary.name: Summon: Attack! (2 Actions)
entries: 尼克斯命令他的一个召唤物去攻击一个敌方生物。
国王军队的指挥官们
国王手下的所有部队都向三位指挥官中的一位报告。每位指挥官都是一个令人生畏的
他或她自己的权利的战士，通过伟大的勇敢和智慧的壮举赢得了他或她的部队的尊重。
军队的最大部分向泰冯报告，他是一个可怕的半兽人战士，后来成为战略家。佩奇-特鲁斯特里克（Paige Truestrike），一个虔诚的女人，领导着国王的专业部队，从狼骑兵到米特拉尔卫队。最后一位指挥官是一位名叫尼克斯-里弗松（Nix Riversong）的强大施法者，负责监督国王手下所有的施法者。
指挥官泰丰
泰丰，曾经是一个野蛮的战士，随着年龄的增长，他转向了指挥别人。在他的全盛时期，他因其不可能的战斗壮举而闻名整个王国，击败了无数的对手。即使是现在，人们还可以看到邰风司令与他的部队一起训练，拒绝因年龄增长而丧失能力。
战争大师。
通过多年在军队中的战斗，邰风见识了大军所采用的所有常见战术。凭借多年的经验，邰丰已经成为战争大师，为他的同伴创造了毁灭性的演习，帮助他们粉碎敌人。
战斗的快感。
虽然邰丰现在是军队的领导，但他仍然喜欢动手。众所周知，他经常带着部队外出侦察。虽然国王不同意他的鲁莽做法，但部队却很崇拜他，因为他不是一个坐在后方帐篷里的指挥官。

trait.name: Endless Rage
entries: 邰风总是处于愤怒的影响之下，即使他对别人有所隐瞒。他在力量检查和力量投掷方面具有优势。

trait.name: Lover Of Battle
entries: 泰丰在主动出击方面有优势，可以在突击回合中进行攻击。

trait.name: Relentless Endurance (1/Day)
entries: 当泰丰被降低到0点命中率但没有被直接杀死时，他可以下降到1点命中率。

trait.name: Savage Attacks
entries: 当泰丰获得关键一击时，他可以滚动4个额外的武器伤害模子，总共6个伤害模子。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 泰丰可以用他的大斧头进行三次攻击。

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}15 ({@damage 1d12 + 9})砍击伤害。

action.name: Aura Of Anger
entries: 在泰丰的指挥下，30英尺内的每个造物主都会被鞭打成战争狂热。他们在所有的攻击和法术攻击卷上获得优势。他们也会免疫于被（%0%）。这些效果持续到泰丰的下一个回合开始。

action.name: Slam {@recharge 5}
entries: 泰丰用他的大斧头进行两次攻击，然后猛击一个目标生物。该生物必须成功通过灵巧检查。如果救赎失败，该生物会被抛回15英尺，并受到{@condition prone}的伤害。

reaction.name: Savage Cry
entries: 在服用加玛吉后，塔尔丰可以对他的攻击者发出野蛮的战吼。该生物必须做一个{@dc 20}宪法救赎，否则就会被塔尔的{@condition frightened}影响，持续1分钟。该生物可以在他的每个回合结束时再做一次宪法救赎来结束这个效果。

monster.name: Twin Assassin of eldor Alynn

entries: 埃尔多的双胞胎刺客
艾尔多尔小镇位于国王土地的东部边缘。虽然是一个简单的小镇，但艾尔多尔是王国中两个最臭名昭著的刺客的出生地。虽然很少有人知道这对刺客的出生地，但更少有人知道她们是双胞胎。两位不同的、独特的半精灵女性，刺客们采用各种方法来为国王服务。
辽宁省
当被要求想象一个刺客时，在国王的土地上，大多数人都会想到Alynn。作为最突出、最知名的刺客，阿莲并不隐藏自己。相反，她向所有人宣称她的能力，挑战其他人试图杀死她，而这一任务没有人成功过。
书的封面。
Alynn看起来像任何30岁出头的普通半精灵女性。她没有明显的标记或特征。她朴素的特征是她最大的优势之一，使她能够不被注意地溜进戒备最森严的地方。一旦到了那里，她可以很容易地冒充人类或精灵，让她周围的人感到困惑。
虽然对阿莲的过去了解不多，但大家都知道她是个技艺精湛的人。她花了一生中最重要的几年来学习刀法和影子的方法，直到她成为两者的大师。现在，她作为王国中最熟练的刺客之一获得了回报。

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Alynn在对被害人的救赎上有优势（%0%），而且魔法无法使她入睡。

trait.name: Ventriloquist
entries: Alynn是一个声音的大师。在听完一个生物说的一句话后，她获得了完美模仿他们声音的能力，甚至可以将她的声音抛向任何方向100英尺。

trait.name: Master Of Shadows
entries: 如果Alynn花了1分钟准备，她可以融入任何背景。躲藏时，她不能移动，否则有被发现的危险。一个{@dc 25}感知检查会提醒生物注意Alynn的存在。

trait.name: Sneak Attack
entries: 如果Alynn攻击一个惊讶的生物，或者在她的攻击中拥有优势，她会造成额外的44（（%0%））的伤害。她每回合只能造成一次这种伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Alynn可以用她的弯刀进行三次攻击。

action.name: Scimitar (dual-wield)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5})砍击伤害，或52 ({@damage 1d6 + 5 + 8d6})偷袭伤害。

action.name: Garrote (Recharges After A Short Or Long Rest)
entries: Alynn将绞刑具套在5英尺内的一个生物的脖子上。她做了一个攻击卷，命中率为（%0%）。一旦命中，她会切开他们的气管，导致该生物在每个回合开始时开始流血，造成39（（1%））的伤害，直到痊愈。此外，该生物失去了说话或施放带有语言成分的法术的能力。

action.name: Smoke Bomb (1/Day)
entries: Alynn在她的脚下扔了一个烟雾弹。半径30英尺内的所有生物都被笼罩在腐臭的黑烟中，提供全面的掩护，并将所有视线限制在5英尺以内。除了Alynn之外，所有在烟雾中开始他们的回合的生物都必须通过一个{@dc 14}宪法救赎，否则就会在回合中咳嗽。

legendaryHeader: Alynn can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Alynn regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Return To Shadows
entries: 阿林溜回阴影中，移动到10英尺，采取隐藏行动。

legendary.name: Backstab (Costs 2 Actions}
entries: Alynn绕过5英尺内的一个生物，直到她在它后面。一旦到了这里，她可以用她的scimtar进行一次有利的攻击。这个动作不会引起机会攻击。

legendary.name: Vanish (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Alynn从视线中消失，在下一个生物的回合结束时重新出现在她原来位置的30英尺内。

monster.name: Twin Assassin of eldor Sane

entries: 埃尔多的双胞胎刺客
艾尔多尔小镇位于国王土地的东部边缘。虽然是一个简单的小镇，但艾尔多尔是王国中两个最臭名昭著的刺客的出生地。虽然很少有人知道这对刺客的出生地，但更少有人知道她们是双胞胎。两位不同的、独特的半精灵女性，刺客们采用各种方法来为国王服务。
虽然阿莲可能是最知名的刺客，但她并不是最熟练的。这个头衔是留给阿莲的双胞胎妹妹塞恩（发音为San-eh）的。很少有人知道塞恩是谁，更少有人见过她。
患病。
当塞恩还是个小女孩的时候，她的眼睛得了一种神奇的疾病。治疗方法，强大的费伊魔法，改变了她的核心，给她的血液和身体注入了费伊的色彩。自从她康复后，塞恩发展出了神奇的力量，由于引入她体内的费伊魔法而加剧和加强。
Enchanting.
Sane is always wearing a cloak which covers her from head to foot. She wears this cloak to hide attention away from her, as her body was scared by the fey magic used to heal her.
Though scarred, Sane is anything but grotesque. The fey magic enhanced her beauty, turning her into one of the
most beautiful women in the kingdom. The sight of her uncloaked is enough to cause men and women to stop and gape, momentarily forgetting whatever they were doing.

Siren Tactics. Sena does not take a life lightly, but when she does, she does it carefully. She has learned to control the fey magic in her veins, casting powerful charms and illusions on her targets. Once she has them under her spell, she strikes, quickly and quietly killing them before retreating to the shadows. Her illusions are so powerful, many do not realize what is occurring even as she kills them.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Sane has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Void Eye
entries: Sane's eye has been corrupted by the void. Through it, she can see {@condition invisible} creatures and cannot be surprised.

trait.name: Void Blood
entries: If Sane deals force damage to a target, she heals hit points equal to the damage dealt.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Sane can make two attacks with her force dagger.

action.name: Force Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) force damage.

action.name: Swallow Soul
entries: Sane stares directly at an incapitated or {@condition restrained} creature within 30 feet with her void eye, sapping their life energy. The creature must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 49 ({@damage 14d6}) force damage and suffers two levels of {@condition exhaustion}. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and does not gain {@condition exhaustion}.

legendaryHeader: Sane can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Sane regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Giltterdust
entries: Sane dips into the ethereal realm for a moment. The position of all creatures in a 30 foot radius are revealed to her.

legendary.name: Eye Of The Void
entries: Sane looks directly at one creature with her Void Eye, freezing them in place. The creature must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Force Leech (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Sane targets a wounded creature and saps their lifeforce. The target creature must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes (21) {@damage 6d6} force damage. On a successful save, the target creature takes half damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Sane is a 12th-level spelicaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, +9 to hit with spell attacks). Sane has the following warlock spells prepared:

entries: Mithril Guard

The Mithril Guard is known throughout the kingdom. The personal bodyguards of the king, they follow His Majesty to all destinations, a fearsome and deadly entourage. Little is known about these guards, except that they are tough warriors who are loyal only to the King.
Birthright.

The men and women who make up the Mithril Guard are chosen at birth. Their growth is carefully watched, and if the Overseers deem the child fit, he is chosen to become a guard. Once they reach the age of ten, these young children begin training which will last them ten years, during which their bodies and minds will be carved into the perfect king's guard.
Well-Travelled.

Every guard travels throughout the kingdom during his training. He spends times amongst the dwarves and the elves, learning their culture, not to be closer to the King's subjects, but so they can think like potential enemies of the King. A Mithril Guard has memorized the layout of the land and is never lost inside the King's domain.
特殊设备。

The Mithril Guard gets its name from the dull green glow of their full plate armor and their great swords. The common people whisper, attributing the glow to magic, others saying that the glow is a visualization of their power. The truth, known only to a select few, is that that their armor and weaponry is specially crafted. The unique metal mithril is used to create the weapons and armor of the guard, making his armor stronger and his weapons hit harder. The aftereffect of this special treatment process is the dull green glow ever-present on every Mithril Guard.

trait.name: Magical Armor
entries: The guard's armor is made out of a special mithril blend, causing it to be resistant to all magical effects, such as the spell heat metal.

trait.name: Indomitable
entries: The guard is unable to be intimidated.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mithril guard can make up to three attacks with his great sword. He can use Sweeping Strike or Trip Attack in place of two of the attacks.

action.name: Great Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sweeping Strike
entries: The guard swings his sword in a large arc, hitting all creatures in a 5 feet radius. The guard makes an attack role against all enemies within 5 feet, dealing damage to all targets hit.

action.name: Trip Attack
entries: The guard chooses one creature within 5 feet and delivers a devastating blow aimed at knocking the target creature {@condition prone}. The guard makes a weapon attack roll, and on a successful hit, the target creature must pass a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
Blue Elf
INFANTRY
Blue elves are peculiar creatures.

Many elves show a natural disposition to magic at an early age; blue elves, however, display this proficiency differently. As these elves reach their teenage years, their skin develops a light blue sheen, a glow which distinguishes them from their peers and all others. Around the same age, they begin showing an aptitude in magic, a few years after other elves.
Primitive Casting.

Once a blue elf's magical aptitude is revealed, they immediately begin training at the Magic Academy. However, though they go through the same rigorous training all initiates go through, the blue elves never show an aptitude with offensive spells, excelling instead at domination and manipulative spells.
Magnetic Aura.

Blue elves are trained separately from other initiates. This is not meant to segregate them for their skin color or primitive casting. Each blue elf is separated because the magic of others seem to be attracted to him. A spell cast in his vicinity will be redirected towards the elf and spit back at the unintentional assailant. At first, a blue elf has no control over this, but through years of study and training, learns to control this mysterious and powerful ability.
Magical Lightning Rod.

The King and his military advisors saw the power of the blue elves and knew that their power can be used to protect the large army under the King's control. Blue elves are used as a magical deterrent, their control of domination and manipulation spells make them the most effective tools at killing enemy magic users.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: A blue elf has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

action.name: Quarterstaff (One-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 + 0}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Quarterstaff (Two-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8 + 0}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The blue elf is a 10th level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The blue elf has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

reaction.name: Reflect Spell (5/Day)
entries: Magic is attracted to the blue elf as If he were a magnet. If a spell is cast targeting the blue elf or another creature within 15 feet, the blue elf can roll a Charisma saving throw against the spellcaster's spell save DC. If the blue elf's roll succeeds, he absorbs the magic, taking no damage, and reflects it back at the caster, including all additional effects and modifiers tied to the spell, using the blue elf's spell save DC and spell attack bonus. This works for spells of all levels and does not consume a spell slot. On a failed save, the spell continues as intended, but deals only half damage.
Wyvern Rider
INFANTRY

Though only few in number, wyvern riders are known throughout the kingdom. Always on the back of their trusted companions, they can be seen darting through the sky, doing the King's bidding quickly and efficiently.
Chosen.

The art of wyvern taming and riding is a closely guarding secret in the kingdom. Once every five years, all the half-elves in the kingdom are inspected by an Overseer. If the Overseer sees potential in the young half- elf, they are presented with a wyvern egg. If the egg hatches before a year has passed, they are accepted as a future wyvern rider and trained, alongside their wyvern, to be vassals of the King.
Two Bodies, One Mind.

The wyvern rider bonds with her wyvern on a raw, magical level. Since the moment of the wyvern's birth, the future rider is tasked with raising and caring for the creature until it matures. Through this multi-year process, the two bond and become inseparable, both on and off the battlefield. Those unlucky riders who lost their wyverns, known as fallen riders, fly into an inconsolable rage, killing everything in their sight. The only escape that has been found for these lost riders is death, and they are killed quickly before they do irreparable harm to the kingdom.

trait.name: Bond of Beast and Man
entries: While within 10 feet of her wyvern, the rider has advantage on all Dexterity and Charisma saving throws.

trait.name: Feral Protector
entries: If the rider's wyvern has taken damage since the rider's previous turn, the rider has advantage on her next attack.

trait.name: Mork of the Beast
entries: The wyvern rider can cast the spell hunter's mark as a bonus action, giving both her and her wyvern the benefits of the spell

trait.name: Rage of Loss
entries: If the rider's wyvern dies, the rider transforms into a fallen rider. She gains an additional attack per round with both weapons but falls into an unconsoleable rage, attacking everything in sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wyvern rider can make two attacks with her lance and one attack with her whip

action.name: Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) piercing damage. You have disadvantage when you use a lance to attack a target within 5 feet of you. Also, a lance requires two hands to wield when you aren't mounted.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage.
Sergeant
INFANTRY
An army is nothing without its foot soldiers. Either in small groups or large armies, men and women travel the King's lands, enforcing laws and maintaining peace.

Modular Units. A unit of the King's Army is composed of 4 to 5 infantryman, 2 to 3 spearmen, 3 to 4 archers, 1 to 2 cavalry scout, and 1 war mage under the leadership of a sergeant. This is the smallest unit of troops that the King deploys into his lands.

Pieces of Whole. The small units of the King's army occasionally come together under the leadership of a high ranking military official. However, due to the sheer number of troops, each group is still under the authority of the sergeant.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sergeant makes two attacks with his greatsword.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning  damage.

action.name: Rally Troops {@recharge 5}
entries: The sergeant rallies his troops with a war cry, giving all friendly units with 30 feet advantage on their next attack roll.

trait.name: INFANTRY
entries: An army is nothing without its foot soldiers. Either in small groups or large armies, men and women travel the King's lands, enforcing laws and maintaining peace.

trait.name: Pieces of Whole
entries: The small units of the King's army occasionally come together under the leadership of a high ranking military official. However, due to the sheer number of troops, each group is still under the authority of the sergeant.

trait.name: Modular Units
entries: A unit of the King's Army is composed of 4 to 5 infantryman, 2 to 3 spearmen, 3 to 4 archers, 1 to 2 cavalry scout, and 1 war mage under the leadership of a sergeant. This is the smallest unit of troops that the King deploys into his lands.
Archer
INFANTRY
An army is nothing without its foot soldiers. Either in small groups or large armies, men and women travel the King's lands, enforcing laws and maintaining peace.

Modular Units. A unit of the King's Army is composed of 4 to 5 infantryman, 2 to 3 spearmen, 3 to 4 archers, 1 to 2 cavalry scout, and 1 war mage under the leadership of a sergeant. This is the smallest unit of troops that the King deploys into his lands.

Pieces of Whole. The small units of the King's army occasionally come together under the leadership of a high ranking military official. However, due to the sheer number of troops, each group is still under the authority of the sergeant.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Mob Attack
entries: 5e DMG: page 250 as a complete mass combat system
The 5e DMG has a short section on "handling mobs:" it has a chart for approximating, out of a group of attacking monsters, how many monsters hit.

Subtract attacker's hit bonus from the target's AC. Cross-index that number on the chart. If the number is 1-5, all the attackers hit; if it's 6-12, 1/2 of them hit; etc., up to 1 in 20 of the attackers hitting on a 20.

action.name: Volley
entries: Multiple archers launch a volley of arrows in a target area within 150 feet. All creatures in a 20 foot radius must make a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) damage per archer firing, taking half damage ona successful save.

trait.name: INFANTRY
entries: An army is nothing without its foot soldiers. Either in small groups or large armies, men and women travel the King's lands, enforcing laws and maintaining peace.

trait.name: Pieces of Whole
entries: The small units of the King's army occasionally come together under the leadership of a high ranking military official. However, due to the sheer number of troops, each group is still under the authority of the sergeant.

trait.name: Modular Units
entries: A unit of the King's Army is composed of 4 to 5 infantryman, 2 to 3 spearmen, 3 to 4 archers, 1 to 2 cavalry scout, and 1 war mage under the leadership of a sergeant. This is the smallest unit of troops that the King deploys into his lands.

trait.name: Coordination
entries: If there are multiple archers, instead of attacking they may take the Volley action.

Pieces of Whole. The small units of the King's army occasionally come together under the leadership of a high ranking military official. However, due to the sheer number of troops, each group is still under the authority of the sergeant.

action.name: Quarterstaff (One-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Quarterstaff (Two-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Mob Attack
entries: 5e DMG: page 250 as a complete mass combat system

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The war mage is a 5th level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The war mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

entries: Cavalry Scout

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Scout
entries: A cavalry scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Longsword (One-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longsword (Two-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Defensive Posture
entries: The infantryman holds his shield up defensively, providing half cover to all units behind him and imposing disadvantage on all the next attack made against the infantryman.

action.name: Mob Attack
entries: 5e DMG: page 250 as a complete mass combat system

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage in melee, or 4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage at range, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Spear (One-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear (Thrown)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear (Two-Handed)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Unit Loyalty
entries: If another member of the spearman's unit has taken damage since the beginning of his last round, the Spearman deals an additional {@dice 1d4} with his next spear attack.
